animeTitle: Kara no Kyoukai: Mirai Fukuin Extra Chorus
otherNames: the Garden of sinners -recalled out summer- extra chorus, 劇場版 空の境界 未来福音 extra chorus
synopsis: Based on a novel by Nasu Kinoko, writer for Type-Moon. Kara no Kyoukai: Mirai Fukuin takes place about a decade after the ending of Kara no Kyoukai.
